name: NSCollectionViewElement
desc: A set of methods that you use to manage the content in a collection view.

items.name: func prepareForReuse()
items.desc: Performs any necessary cleanup to prepare the element for use again.

items.name: func preferredLayoutAttributesFitting(NSCollectionViewLayoutAttributes) -> NSCollectionViewLayoutAttributes
items.desc: Asks your element if it wants to modify any layout attributes before they are applied.

items.name: func apply(NSCollectionViewLayoutAttributes)
items.desc: Applies the specified layout attributes to the element.

items.name: func willTransition(from: NSCollectionViewLayout, to: NSCollectionViewLayout)
items.desc: Tells the element that the layout object of the collection view is about to change.

items.name: func didTransition(from: NSCollectionViewLayout, to: NSCollectionViewLayout)
items.desc: Tells the element that the layout object of the collection view changed.
